data.scheme_name: International Cooperation Scheme  - Capacity Building of First Time MSE Exporters (CBFTE)
data.benefits: Scheme provides reimbursement for Registration-cum-Membership Certificate at the rate of 5% of the cost paid subject to a maximum of Rs.0.20 lakh  or actual, whichever is lower.
data.eligibility: All Micro and Small Enterprise with valid Udyam Registration are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. To claim the benefits under the scheme, the applicants Importer Exporter Code (IEC) must not be older than 3 years on the date of export shipment. 
  2. Claim must be accompanied with the documents.
data.beneficiaries: All Micro and Small Enterprise with valid Udyam Registration are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. To claim the benefits under the scheme, the applicants Importer Exporter Code (IEC) must not be older than 3 years on the date of export shipment. 
  2. Claim must be accompanied with the documents.
data.nodal_agency: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
data.context: The scheme is introduced to provides opportunities for MSMEs to continuously update themselves to meet the challenges emerging out of changes in technology, changes in demand, emergence of new markets, etc.
data.objective: The scheme aim at various aspects required to advance MSMEs position as emerging export player.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement for : 

  1. Registration-cum-Membership Certificate at the rate of 5% of the cost paid subject to a maximum of Rs.0.20 lakh or actual, whichever is lower. 
  2. Export Insurance Premium paid to Export Credit Guarantee Corporation (ECGC) : Maximum reimbursement t in a financial year of Rs.0.10 lakh or actual, whichever is lower. 
  3. Fee paid on Testing & Quality Certification : 75 percent of the testing and quality certification with a ceiling of Rs. 1.00 Lakh or actual, whichever is lower.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant will submit an online application for financial assistance, along with the relevant documents in the proforma on the website : https://ic.msme.gov.in/IC_APP/IC_Welcome.aspx
data.funding_facilitator: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
data.funding_mechanism: Grants under the Scheme will be released on re-imbursement basis on submission of the re-imbursement claim in the proforma.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) 
2. E-ticket with fare information on e-ticket itself for air travel 
3. Original Boarding Passes 
4. Original Invoice/Bills and Receipt of Payment 
5. Unique ID of Organization as registered in PFMS 
6. Unique ID of Organization as registered in NGO Darpan portal of Niti Aayog 
7. PAN Card of the Association 
8. TAN if any 
9. Annexure I* 
10. Annexure II* 
11. Annexure III* 
14. Other KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
Ministry of MSME,

New Delhi -110011

data.beneficiary: All Industry  - All Entities  - All Locations  - MSEs
